content:
Hi T-Compiler, can anyone familiar with the needs_drop code take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90218? This was a bug that has been reported couple times with the edition migration lint in the stable release channe.

I took a look and based on my understanding the fix looks correct, but someone else should also take a look and hopefully get this merged soon.

Maybe this can be beta/stable backport-nominated as well?
I'm behind on notifications again for the last week or two :(

nikomatsakis said:

I'll take a look

thank you so much for getting this in
